creator: BYRIL
descriptionHtml:
Sea Battle 2 is everyone's favorite board game from their childhood with new abilities and an expanded arsenal! Millions of people around the world play this game. You will have battleships, airplanes, submarines, mines, and radar at your disposal—and that's not all. Place your battleships on the battlefield and launch attacks on your opponent's field. Use various types of weapons to sink the enemy's naval fleet and win the battle.

Fight against players from all around the world online in real time! Build your game strategy, improve your tactics, and don't give your rivals a chance! Increase your rank and become the admiral of your fleet!

Build your port city and collect rewards! Win in epic arenas and unlock new buildings. Build military bases, shipyards, factories, skyscrapers, landmarks, and much more!

Game features:

⚓ ONLINE BATTLES
Fight against players from all around the world through the internet!

⚓ ONLINE GAME WITH FRIENDS
Send invitations and play online with your friends

⚓ RANKS
Win battles to raise your rank and title from sailor to admiral!

⚓ ARENAS
Take part in battles in epic arenas, unlock new ones, and get rewards!

⚓ PORT CITY
Become a hero in your own city that you design and build!

⚓ PLAY VIA BLUETOOTH
Set up battles with your friends, colleagues, or just acquaintances over Bluetooth.

⚓ PLAY WITH A FRIEND
Play with friends on one phone (tablet), take turns placing your ships, choose your arsenal, and fight!

⚓ TRAIN WITH A BOT
Choose the appropriate level of difficulty and try to defeat the AI (artificial intelligence).

⚓ CUSTOMIZATION
Customize your war fleet and arsenal equipment and unlock various skins from the World War I era to modern times. Choose a formidable name for yourself, a cool avatar, and the flag of your fleet.

⚓ CHAT
Interact with players during battle with chat and emojis.

⚓ MULTIPLE GAME MODES
Select advanced mode or classic mode without additional weaponry.

⚓ TOURNAMENTS AND TROPHIES
Participate in tournaments and win trophies. Fill your trophy room!

⚓ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
Increase your ranking and become the best player on the global leaderboards based on your number of wins!

Sea Battle 2 is a game with beautiful graphics in the style of a notebook and effects that lend the game originality and an unforgettable atmosphere.

Sea Battle 2 is a free game, but some game elements can be purchased for real money.

*****
The time has come to find out who is the strongest in a sea battle!

Like Sea Battle 2? Find out more!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/byril_games/
descriptionShort: Fight against players from all over the world in a sea battle!

title: Sea Battle 2

creator: BYRIL
descriptionHtml:
Sea Battle 2 is everyone's favorite board game from their childhood with new abilities and an expanded arsenal! Millions of people around the world play this game. You will have battleships, airplanes, submarines, mines, and radar at your disposal—and that's not all. Place your battleships on the battlefield and launch attacks on your opponent's field. Use various types of weapons to sink the enemy's naval fleet and win the battle.

Fight against players from all around the world online in real time! Build your game strategy, improve your tactics, and don't give your rivals a chance! Increase your rank and become the admiral of your fleet!

Build your port city and collect rewards! Win in epic arenas and unlock new buildings. Build military bases, shipyards, factories, skyscrapers, landmarks, and much more!

Game features:

⚓ ONLINE BATTLES
Fight against players from all around the world through the internet!

⚓ ONLINE GAME WITH FRIENDS
Send invitations and play online with your friends

⚓ RANKS
Win battles to raise your rank and title from sailor to admiral!

⚓ ARENAS
Take part in battles in epic arenas, unlock new ones, and get rewards!

⚓ PORT CITY
Become a hero in your own city that you design and build!

⚓ PLAY VIA BLUETOOTH
Set up battles with your friends, colleagues, or just acquaintances over Bluetooth.

⚓ PLAY WITH A FRIEND
Play with friends on one phone (tablet), take turns placing your ships, choose your arsenal, and fight!

⚓ TRAIN WITH A BOT
Choose the appropriate level of difficulty and try to defeat the AI (artificial intelligence).

⚓ CUSTOMIZATION
Customize your war fleet and arsenal equipment and unlock various skins from the World War I era to modern times. Choose a formidable name for yourself, a cool avatar, and the flag of your fleet.

⚓ CHAT
Interact with players during battle with chat and emojis.

⚓ MULTIPLE GAME MODES
Select advanced mode or classic mode without additional weaponry.

⚓ TOURNAMENTS AND TROPHIES
Participate in tournaments and win trophies. Fill your trophy room!

⚓ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
Increase your ranking and become the best player on the global leaderboards based on your number of wins!

Sea Battle 2 is a game with beautiful graphics in the style of a notebook and effects that lend the game originality and an unforgettable atmosphere.

Sea Battle 2 is a free game, but some game elements can be purchased for real money.

*****
The time has come to find out who is the strongest in a sea battle!

Like Sea Battle 2? Find out more!

title: Sea Battle 2

creator: Byril
descriptionHtml:
Sea Battle 2 is everyone's favorite board game from their childhood with new abilities and an expanded arsenal! Millions of people around the world play this game. You will have battleships, airplanes, submarines, mines, and radar at your disposal—and that's not all. Place your battleships on the battlefield and launch attacks on your opponent's field. Use various types of weapons to sink the enemy's naval fleet and win the battle.

Fight against players from all around the world online in real time! Build your game strategy, improve your tactics, and don't give your rivals a chance! Increase your rank and become the admiral of your fleet!

Build your port city and collect rewards! Win in epic arenas and unlock new buildings. Build military bases, shipyards, factories, skyscrapers, landmarks, and much more!

Game features:

⚓ ONLINE BATTLES
Fight against players from all around the world through the internet!

⚓ ONLINE GAME WITH FRIENDS
Send invitations and play online with your friends

⚓ RANKS
Win battles to raise your rank and title from sailor to admiral!

⚓ ARENAS
Take part in battles in epic arenas, unlock new ones, and get rewards!

⚓ PORT CITY
Become a hero in your own city that you design and build!

⚓ PLAY VIA BLUETOOTH
Set up battles with your friends, colleagues, or just acquaintances over Bluetooth.

⚓ PLAY WITH A FRIEND
Play with friends on one phone (tablet), take turns placing your ships, choose your arsenal, and fight!

⚓ TRAIN WITH A BOT
Choose the appropriate level of difficulty and try to defeat the AI (artificial intelligence).

⚓ CUSTOMIZATION
Customize your war fleet and arsenal equipment and unlock various skins from the World War I era to modern times. Choose a formidable name for yourself, a cool avatar, and the flag of your fleet.

⚓ CHAT
Interact with players during battle with chat and emojis.

⚓ MULTIPLE GAME MODES
Select advanced mode or classic mode without additional weaponry.

⚓ TOURNAMENTS AND TROPHIES
Participate in tournaments and win trophies. Fill your trophy room!

⚓ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
Increase your ranking and become the best player on the global leaderboards based on your number of wins!

Sea Battle 2 is a game with beautiful graphics in the style of a notebook and effects that lend the game originality and an unforgettable atmosphere.

Sea Battle 2 is a free game, but some game elements can be purchased for real money.

*****
The time has come to find out who is the strongest in a sea battle!

Like Sea Battle 2? Find out more!

title:
Sea Battle 2
3.8.9

creator: Byril
descriptionHtml:
Sea Battle 2 is the ultimate battleship and naval combat game where you can battle players from around the globe, build your own port city, and customize your fleet! Relive the classic board game from your childhood with exciting new features and modern gameplay.

⚓ ONLINE BATTLES

Challenge players worldwide in real-time naval combat! Test your strategy and tactics to sink their fleet before they sink yours.

⚓ BUILD YOUR PORT CITY

Create a thriving port city with military bases, shipyards, factories, and iconic landmarks. Unlock new buildings and rewards as you progress!

⚓ CUSTOMIZE YOUR FLEET

Personalize your battleships and arsenal with unique skins, ranging from World War I classics to modern designs. Choose your fleet's name, avatar, and flag to stand out on the battlefield.

⚓ RANK UP & BECOME AN ADMIRAL

Win battles to climb the ranks and earn prestigious titles, from Sailor to Admiral. Prove your skills and dominate the leaderboards!

⚓ PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Invite friends to play online or via Bluetooth. You can even play on the same device, taking turns to outsmart each other.

⚓ TRAIN WITH AI

Hone your skills by battling AI opponents. Choose from different difficulty levels to prepare for real-world challenges.

⚓ TOURNAMENTS & TROPHIES

Compete in thrilling tournaments, win trophies, and showcase your achievements in your trophy room.

⚓ MULTIPLE GAME MODES

Choose between classic mode or advanced mode with additional weapons and strategies.

⚓ CHAT & EMOJIS

Communicate with opponents during battles using chat and emojis. Trash-talk or make allies—it's up to you!

⚓ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS

Climb the ranks and become the top player in the world based on your victories!

Sea Battle 2 combines nostalgic notebook-style graphics with modern effects, creating a unique and unforgettable strategy game experience. The game is free to play, with optional in-app purchases for additional content.

---

The time has come to prove who rules the seas!

Download Sea Battle 2 now and start your naval combat adventure!

Follow us on Instagram for updates: https://www.instagram.com/byril_games/
descriptionShort: Command your fleet in epic battleship battles! Play online & dominate the seas!
